thread.title: Eye shot the mesmerizing Flora and Fauna Jim Corbett (Kunal agarwal)
thread.title_full: Eye shot the mesmerizing Flora and Fauna Jim Corbett (Kunal agarwal)

title: Eye shot the mesmerizing Flora and Fauna Jim Corbett (Kunal agarwal)
text: 5.Khus Khus*BambooCorbett vegetation also includes a part of Bamboo vegetation. The main species is Male Bamboo having clustered stout stems and shining papery stem sheaths.*Shrubs Shrubs dominate the forest floor. Various species are:-1. Ber, provides food and habitat to many birds and animals.2. Maror phali have fruits in twisted spiralling pods form.3. Karaunda with pinkish-white flowers and sour fruit is found under sal. 4. Hisar has yellow, juicy, berry-like fruits that are savoured by animals. 5. Jhau is found along the Ramganga basin on sandy or rocky soil.Corbett National Park FaunaCorbett National Park is well known for its ferocious yet handsome Royal Bengal Tigers.Corbett National Park also comprises of about 50 mammal, 25 reptile species, and 580 bird species. The Corbett National Park has a wide range of mammals like, the birds, the reptiles and amphibians, the fishes, the insects, the molluscs, the crustaceans and more.Fauna at Jim Corbett can be classified as:-*The Mammals In this category falls, the Predators, , Antelopes and Deer, Elephants ,Wild Pig the Monkeys and more.*The BirdsThe most eye- catchy birds found in the Corbett National Park are Cormorants, the Darter, the Grey Heron, Egrets, the Cattle Egret, the White-necked and Black-necked Storks, the Spot bill, the Large Pied Wagtail, White-capped Redstart etc.*The ReptilesThe Lakes and Ramganga River inside the Corbett National Park support a variety of reptiles like Gharial and Muggar. Nature at Solluna ResortCorbett National park is a Paradise, and Solluna Resort is an angel to it. Witness the Nature's exotic flora and fauna, along with the streaming water of River Ramganga. Take a joy while watching greenery around you and experience the adventurous wildlife safari. About the Author The Solluna Resorts in Jim Corbett is delightfully placed in the Himalayan valley, on the bank of River giving mesmerizing views of setting sun and rising moon every evening. Are resort offers you Jungle safari in Corbett, Jeep safari , elephant safari, fishing, nature walking along with riverside, bird safari, village expedition, accommodation and many more. Rating:
